summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 8, Hillman City, Division No. 1, being the alley between Orcas Street and Mead Street, extending from 42nd Avenue South to the north and south alley of said block, by grading and graveling the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7386, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
